summary: This is a Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General Investigations Division transcription request form for an audio interview related to case number 2019010614. The form requests transcription of a 1 hour 7 minute 8 second interview recorded on April 7, 2022, with an estimated cost of $274.38. The subject's name appears to be partially redacted.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned in the 'Names and Unfamiliar Terms' field as a relevant term for the transcription, indicating the recording likely pertains to him or his case.

events.title: Audio interview conducted
events.description: An audio interview was recorded, lasting 1 hour, 7 minutes, and 8 seconds, which is the subject of this transcription request.

events.title: Transcription request submitted
events.description: A DOJ OIG Investigations Division transcription request form was completed and approved by a supervisor for the April 7, 2022, audio interview.

keyFacts: The document is a DOJ OIG transcription request form for case number 2019010614, related to Jeffrey Epstein.
It requests transcription of a 1 hour 7 minute 8 second audio interview recorded on April 7, 2022.
The subject's name in the 'Full Name of Recording Subject' field appears to be partially redacted or incomplete, with only a last name visible.
Jeffrey Epstein is listed in the 'Names and Unfamiliar Terms' field, confirming the recording's relevance to his case.
The form indicates the interview was likely conducted by the NYFO (New York Field Office) and mentions the Metropolitan Correctional Center.
